title: Mini-Ep 35: Serum Secrets with Jasmine Guillory
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 35: Serum Secrets with Jasmine Guillory
itunes:subtitle: This week Kate and Doree welcome their first guest to the mini-episode world! Jasmine Guillory — lawyer, author of the new book The Proposal, and past Forever35 guest — is back to help answer listener questions about making time for baths, how much to ...
description:
This week Kate and Doree welcome their first guest to the mini-episode world! Jasmine Guillory — lawyer, author of the new book The Proposal, and past Forever35 guest — is back to help answer listener questions about making time for baths, how much to spend on serums, and tackling growing pains in a friendship. Plus, Jasmine discusses her year-long yoga challenge, daily bath rituals, and how she lets go of guilt.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the show at forever35podcast@gmail.com. To learn more, visit forever35podcast.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Milk and Honey - Use code forever25 for 25% off your first order.
  • HelloFresh - Use code forever60 for $20 off each of your first 3 boxes for a total of $60 off.
  • Banish - Use code forever35 for $10 off your first purchase.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
